HIRE US FOR DESIGN WORK

We are an independent design studio that creates sexy, strong, memorable work for brave clients. We want to work with people and companies who believe that the status quo is not enough, that good work matters, and that design can be a tool to affect opinions and culture. Some of this work even makes it into the MoMA. In the past we’ve worked our magic with MailChimp, Adobe, Esquire Magazine, The New York Times, Moet & Chandon, Yohji Yamamoto, Bobbi Brown, Aveda, The School of Visual Arts, and many others. Drop us a line at james@jamesvictore.com.

INDIVIDUAL CONSULTATION

Interested in a 1 on 1 professional development consultation with James? We offer a small number of in-person and/or skype sessions each month for VIP design direction and creative brainstorming. A one hour session with James is $500. Please inquire at james@jamesvictore.com for more information and booking.

STUDIO VISITS

In order to safeguard our sanity, we no longer permit studio visits, however we do have one night every month dedicated to visiting, sharing, and reveling in each others’ company. It’s open to everyone and it’s called “Victore After Hours”. Check Twitter and Instagram for the next engagement.
